resources.string: Tanta is located between Cairo and Alexandria: 94 km (58 mi) north of Cairo and 130 km (81 mi) southeast of Alexandria.
Tanta is a large city in Egypt for that this app will help you to know more about it.
Tanta city app will help you to search hotel and book in any hotel you want. also it will help you to know more about tourist areas in tanta.
